eya danaganna pragnyawa shrathamayagnyana weyi yath:ek dharmayek wadiya yuthu ya: (madhurasukhawedana sangkhyatha) sathaya ha samprayuktha kayagathasathiya yi:dharmayo dedenek wadiyayuththaha: shamathaya da widarshanawa da yana deka yi.dharmayo thidenek wadiyayuththahu ya: (sawitharkasawicharadi) thun samadhihu ya.dharmayo sathara denek wadiyayuththahu ya: (kayanupassanadi) satharasathipattanayo yi.dharmayo pasdenek wadiyayuththahu ya: (pithiparanathadi) panychanggika wu chathurthadhyanasamadhiya yi.dharmayo sadenek wadiyayuththahu ya: (buddhanussathi aadi) sawadarum anusmruthisthanayo yi.dharmayo sathdenek wadiyayuththahu ya: sapthabodhyanggayo yi.dharmayo atadenek wadiyayuththahu ya: aaryyaashtanggikamargaya yi.dharmayo nawadenek wadiyayuththahu ya: (shilawishuddhiaadi) parishuddhabhawayata pradhana karana wu nawadharmayo yi.dharmayo dasadenek wadiyayuththahu ya: dasakasinayathanayo yi.bhawanawo dedeneki: laukikabhanawa ya, lokoththarabhawana yi.bhawanawo thideneki: rupawacharakushaladharmayange bhawana ya, arupawacharakushaladharmayange bhawana ya, aparyyapanna (lokoththara) kushala dharmayange bhawana yi.
